```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Import the google sheet.

```{r}
install.packages('gsheet')
library(gsheet)
temperaturedata<-gsheet2tbl('docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GQ5Lfg0SlbH6m61Rfe2SBQ0y9V2RMHa0C0LogtgXJkM/edit#gid=0')
```

Organize the data
```{r temperaturedata}
temperaturedata<-temperaturedata[-1,2:4]
colnames(temperaturedata)<-c('','','')
```
